summary: Building and maintaining a cybersecurity workforce is vital to protecting the IT systems that support government operations. But a shortage of skilled workers has made that challenging. We looked at how five departments have implemented key cybersecurity workforce practices. Homeland Security has fully implemented nearly all the practices, but the others implemented less than half. Some departments described actions they've taken to address challenges like...
title: Cybersecurity Workforce: Departments Need to Fully Implement Key Practices
